django-geopostcodes¶

Django modelling for geopostcodes.com

NOTE: This repository does not include the actual data, you must purchase this from geopostcodes.com and then import it as per the following documentation.

django-geopostcodes supports Python 2.7, 3.3, 3.4 and pypy for Django 1.7 and 1.8.
